name: CreateReferenceTable
description:
Create a new reference table in Datadog.

This tool creates a new reference table in Datadog. It can be called by either uploading CSV data to get an upload ID or by providing cloud storage access details. Use this when you need to set up a reference table with data from CSV files.

parameters.name: reference_table_details
parameters.description: JSON object specifying the reference table settings, including attributes like description, file metadata, schema, source, table name, and tags.

description.description: The description of the reference table.

type.description: The field type for reference table schema fields.

primary_keys.description: List of field names that serve as primary keys for the table. Only one primary key is supported, and it is used as an ID to retrieve rows.

source.description: The source type for creating reference table data. Only these source types can be created through this API.

table_name.description: The name of the reference table.

tags.description: The tags of the reference table.

id.description: The ID of the reference table.
